item.title: 12V Car Battery Tester, TOPDON BT20 Battery Load Tester, Voltage Test Digital Alternator Tester, Cranking&Charging Test via App, Budget Automotive Battery Analyzer&Checker for Car Truck SUV ATV Boat
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester 2022 Budget Car Battery Tester Basic function: voltage and load test Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces Item model number ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper

TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester

2022 Budget Car Battery Tester

Basic function: voltage and load test

Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test

TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TOPDON BT20 Car Battery Tester
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 5, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TT TOPDON
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B5T7212M
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

【A Budget-Friendly Car Battery Tester】As a battery tester below 30 bucks, it features 4 testing modes: battery load tester (range 10V-20V), voltage test, cranking test, and charging test (alternator tester), the latter 2 test modes are availabe only with APP, offering you more value for the money. NOTE: For 12V lead-acid batteries. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Fast&Accurate Diagnosis within 1 Second】Simply click the TEST button, and get the testing results within 1 second. This battery tester will display the battery life by way of Low/Medium/High. Adopting the latest conductivity testing technology (up to 99.5% test accuracy). Thus, it makes a great choice for users who want to get results quickly. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Expanded Voltage, Cranking, and Charging Tests with APP】Easily connect to this car battery tester via Bluetooth to get additional cranking, charging, and voltage testing capabilities. Easily view real-time voltage waveform graphs with data playback functionality.
【Comprehensive Vehicle Coverage & Multi-Language Support】Plug & play operation. Simply connect the testing clamps to the battery and you are ready to analyze. This 12V battery tester works on a variety of vehicles with 12V Lead-acid batteries such as boats, motorcycles, ships, and trucks. Also this auto battery tester easily switches between 8 different languages.
【Ideal Car Tool for Every Car Owner】Reverse polarity and “no spark” protection for extra safety. Long 19.75″ clamp leads allow testing from inside or outside the vehicle. A perfect battery analyzer and load tester for small repair shops & car owners alike. Makes a great gift for car enthusiasts.
【8 HOUR TECH SUPPORT HOTLINE】TOPDON provides 2 Year Warranty for all products. In case of any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at 833-956-8335 Monday-Friday 9:00AM-6PM Eastern Time.

BT20 BATTERY LOAD TESTER

The BT20 is TOPDON’s entry-level wireless 12V battery tester. Offering load, voltage, charging, and cranking tests, the BT20 offers high-precision voltage detection and real-time voltage monitoring.

This easy-to-use device lets users of all skill-levels view voltage waveform graphs and test reports through an app. Test reports can be generated automatically, and easily share and save test reports. Data Playback function query battery voltage history data, help users analyze the problem by playing back charge and discharge data reports.

Its load test method provides accurate results, making the BT20 a battery tester with superb cost-effectiveness.

Quick access to test results in the app by linking your phone via Bluetooth.

Run Charging Tests: Test a battery’s charging performance with the app and analyze the results.

Run Cranking Tests: Test the battery through the load of the car itself, and view the results in the app.

Voltage Test:

Further analyze the battery’s health through its voltage, and predict the battery’s power status with the results of the BT20. Three kinds of indicator lights communicate the battery level, full, medium, and low.

Load Test:

Built-in load modules help determine the status of the battery.

Multi-Dimensional Display of Battery Status

No-load and load voltage readings can be displayed in the APP, and there is a real-time voltage waveform graph for accurate monitoring.

Battery Load Test

The BT20 applies load tests and monitors the voltage response of the battery. Users gain a clearer look at the actual remaining battery capacity.

Battery Voltage Test

Once the clamps are connected to the terminals, the BT20 delivers the battery voltage results in the blink of an eye.

Cranking Test

The cranking test measures the battery’s cranking voltage and cranking time when starting up. Normally, the cranking voltage should be above 9.6V. As for the cranking time, The shorter, the better!

Read more

Charging Test

The charging test measures the no-load voltage and load voltage, which helps you to understand the battery charging status, and alternator performance.

Supports 8 Languages to Maximize Utility

English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

A Wide Range of Tests with Highly Accurate Results

The BT20 is designed for versatility. With a variety of testing capabilities, analysis tools, and a battery range of 5 to 20 volts, the tool delivers highly accurate result.

Read more

4.5
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

item.title: Automotive Smoke Leak Tester,EVAP Smoke Machine Diagnostic Leak Detector,Car Pipe Vacuum Leakage Tester & Fuel Pipe Leakage Detector for All 12V Cars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Technical Details Manufacturer ‎VXSCAN Brand ‎VXSCAN Item Weight ‎5.26 pounds Package Dimensions ‎11.54 x 9.84 x 6.81 inches Country of Origin ‎China Manufacturer Part Number ‎V3 Additional Information ASIN B0B1M7NPXT Customer Reviews 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive) ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Technical Details

Manufacturer ‎VXSCAN
Brand ‎VXSCAN
Item Weight ‎5.26 pounds
Package Dimensions ‎11.54 x 9.84 x 6.81 inches
Country of Origin ‎China
Manufacturer Part Number ‎V3

Additional Information

ASIN B0B1M7NPXT
Customer Reviews

5.0 out of 5 stars

2 ratings

5.0 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #109,767 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive)
#45 in Fuel Leak Detectors
#1,777 in Diagnostic, Test & Measurement Tools
Date First Available May 18, 2022

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

VXSCAN is focusing on affordable prices, top quality for every customer.

You Can Trust VXSCAN

VXSCAN is to make our products serve everyone in need all over the world. To this end, we will devote ourselves to professional research and strive to make the best of our products and services.

The Goal of VXSCAN

It is aiming to provide automobile repairers with more professional, simple, practical, economical, efficient and high-quality auto diagnosis products and maintenance tools.

The Service of VXSCAN

To provide an better service customer is one of important reasons for our success and our eternal goal.

VXSCAN is committed to doing an professional supplier of automobile maintenance products,focuses on sloving automotive aftermamrket problems cost-effectively,effciently and conveniently.We hope make every user satisfied is our ultimate pursuit of every product.

【EVAP Leak Detector】V3 Smoke machine can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems. the provided mineral oil creates smoke that’s pumped it through your vehicle’s piping to help you detect the leak’s precise location.
【Why You Need V3】These Situations – 1.The rupture of the vacuum hose will cause the mixture to be too thick, the idle speed will increase, the hot car will not start well, the engine will surge during acceleration, the fuel consumption will increase significantly, and the exhaust pipe will emit black smoke.2. Blocking will cause the idle speed to drift, and the idle speed is easy to stall.3. Air leakage in the vacuum tube will cause the engine to run weakly.
【Easy Operation】1.Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.2. Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.3. Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.4.The pipe will be filled with smoke. Check the leak points. Note：The packaging does not contain oil but there is an oil delivery bottle.
【Adjustable Air Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge Display】You can easily control the air pressure, because if the air pressure is too high, the pipe will be damaged, and if the air pressure is too low, the leak will not be detected; You can observe the barometer to determine whether the car pipeline is leaking. If the barometer index keeps increasing, there is no problem with your car’s pipeline. On the contrary, your car’s pipeline leaks need to be repaired.
【Wide Compatibility】Fuel pipe leakage locator is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats. It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 automotive diagnostic smoke leak detector is designed for testing leaks in vehicle pipe systems.

It could be used on all cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATV, light trucks, boats, etc.

With VXSCAN V3, you can easily check car sealing, throttle shafts, engine block, turbo test system, crankcase system, intake system, exhaust system, fuel tank system, EVAP system, EGR system, cooling system, various pipe fittings leakage problems.

Full System Diagnoses, Won’t Miss Any Leak.

  • Crankcase System Test: Excessive pressure or corrosion of the crankcase is the main reason to damage the seal of the crankcase and cause oil leakage.
  • Intake System Test: Leakage in the air intake system will lead to insufficient intake of the car engine, which will result in scant engine power.
  • Car Sealing Test: Poor airtightness of the car may lead to a lot of inconvenience like inability to keep warm, not soundproof, not waterproof and not dust-proof, etc.
  • Fuel Tank System Test: When there are gaps in the fuel tank and piping caused by improper installation or insufficient sealing of the fuel tank cap, it can cause leaks in the fuel tank system.
  • Turbo Test: The leakage of coolant would cause the engine to report high water temperature.
  • Various Pipe Fitting Test: Smoke testing of brake hoses, power steering hoses, cooling system hoses, air conditioning system hoses, turbocharger hoses, fuel hoses, intake and exhaust system hoses, etc.
  • EVAP System Test: Leakage of the fuel evaporation system will cause fuel vapor to leak into the atmosphere, causing waste and pollution or unstable engine idling.
  • Exhaust System Test: Unpurified harmful gases to be discharged into the atmosphere or increase vehicle noise is the main disadvantage when leaks happened in the exhaust.

How to Operate the Automotive Smoke Leak Detector

Step 1

  • Fill 10ml-20ml test oil to the detector.

Step 2

  • Disconnect the intake pipe of the car. Connect the intake pipe of the car with the detector.

Step 3

  • Connect detector with DC12V battery, it starts to work.

Step 4

  • The pipe will be filled with smoke.Check the leak points.

Read more

Package Includes

  • 1pc x VXSCAN V3 Main Unit
  • 1pc x Standard Cone Adapter (30-85mm)
  • 1pc x Funnel
  • 1pc x Replacement Rubber
  • 1pc x Intake bladder
  • 1pc x Smoke Hose
  • 1pc x Power Cord Clamp
  • 1pc x Test Oil Refill Bottle(oil not included)
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5.1 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

VXSCAN V3 Vacuum Smoke Tester Functions:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

EVAP V3 vacuum leak tester can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

  • Product Specifications:
  • Power Supply: 12V Vehicle Battery, <8Amp
  • Output Pressure: <1.2bar
  • Flow Rate: <7L/Min
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Working Cycle: 5 Min auto-stop

Read more

2 Mode: No need to buy extra air compressor

Air Mode: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE. It can help you test whether there is a leak in the pipe by injecting air into the pipe, and judge by the sound made when the air leaks.

Smoke Mode: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal. It helps you lacate the leak accuarately through the visible smoke. The smoke can be produced within seconds, dramatically reducing diagnostic time.

Overheat & Anti-frost Protection: Built in self-protective system

V3 EVAP vacuum tester is equipped with the latest intelligent protection device.

When the temperature of the device exceeds 70 degrees Celsius, the power protection device will be intelligently activated to turn it off, to ensure the safety of the operator and the device.

The device is also suitable for low temperature operation.

Wide Compatibility: Suitable for all vechicles

VXSCAN V3 vacuum leak smoke machine is used to detect leakage of pipe systems on automobiles, motorcycles, snowmobiles, ATVs, light trucks, and speedboats.

It is suitable for all makes and models of cars.

Read more

Pressure Gauge Displays

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Fast Smoke Output

This machine built-in air compressor, with superior wick and heating element.

It can produce smoke instantly by heating up USP mineral oil or baby oil. 4ft Smoke Outlet Pipe can help reach and connect perfectly.

Note: Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.

Notice before Leak Test

Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle.

It can’t be connected to the 12v power supply in the office, or it cannot output the smoke.It just support a 12V battery with a current range of 8A-10A (Ordinary car batteries are eligible).

Read more

5
Price: $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:43:34 UTC – Details)

Date First Available August 9, 2021

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $59.99 - $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:43 UTC – Details)

From the brand

New Arrivals

Pink Tool Set

Drills & Pliers

Screwdrivers & tool bags

Longer Lasting Power: the pink drill set is powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications.
Compact and Lightweight Design: the pink drill driver allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site.
Multiple Purposes: the pink power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes.
Notice：This is a carbon brushes drill. It is normal that the brushes produce sparks from the electromagnetic charge which are clearly visible inside the drill.
The pink drill set for women is perfect for your home use or gifts.

12V Cordless Drill Set includes:

(1) 12V Cordless Drill Driver;

(1) 12V 1.5AH Lithium-Ion Battery;

(10) HSS6542 drill bits:1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64, 5/32, 11/64, 3/16, 1/4;

(20) Screwdriver bits: Slotted 1/8”, 5/32”, 3/16”, 7/32”, 1/4”, 9/32”, POZI: PZ0, PZ1, PZ2, PZ3; Philips: PH0, PH1 X 2, PH2 X 5, PH3 X 2;

(10) Nut drivers: 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4, 9/32, 5/16, 11/32, 3/8, 7/16, 15/32;

(1) 60mm magnetic extension bar;

(1) Battery Charger;

(1) Tool bag;

FASTPRO 12V Pink Drill Driver

FASTPRO 12V Lithium-ion Cordless Pink Drill Driver Set powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications. The power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes. The compact and lightweight design allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site. Its built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces and allows users to quickly change attachments for any project need.

Read more

Multiple Uses

3/8 keyless chuck with 10pc drill bits, 10pc nut drivers & 20pc screwdriver bits for your work and DIY projects，included the wood or furniture assembling, metal drill and screws driving.

Battery Indicator

  • Green≥70%
  • Orange30%≤remaining＜70%
  • Red< 30%

Easy Storage

The portable tool bag with the adjustable compartments allow you for the easy storage.

Read more

FASTPRO 20V Pink Drill Driver
FASTPRO 232-Piece Pink Drill Driver Set
FASTPRO 220-Piece Pink Tool Set
FASTPRO 12-Piece Pink Screwdrivers Set

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine Leak Detector, VXSCAN EVAP Vacuum Leakage Tester, Fuel Pipe Diagnostic Tester with Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge for All 12V Vehicles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand About VXSCAN Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our high-quality products.

VXSCAN’s Value

VXSCAN has the most comprehensive product portfolio, dedicated staff and dedicated technical team to help you with all your vehicle needs and projects.

VXSCAN’s Vision

We share the same passion for vehicles as you do. Our focus is to provide you with the ultimate experience through exceptional service.

VXSCAN’s Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.67 x 9.88 x 6.85 inches; 5.2 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ VXSCAN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B1QGP86W

【EVAP SMOKE MACHINE】VXSCAN V3 is a professional vacuum machine for car fuel pipe system leak detection. Supports EVAP system test, tightness test, intake system test, exhaust system test and various pipe fittings test. V3 smoke leak detector will help you solve the problem, saving time and money.
【EASY TO USE】By heating USP mineral oil or baby oil, the automotive smoke machine can be outputs lots of smoke within 30 seconds, to improve diagnosis efficiency. This evap smoke machine built-in air pump, you don’t need to purchase extra. V3 help you control the smoke effect easily and allowing you to estimate the size of the leak by the change of the gauge value.
【SMOKE FLOW METER & PRESSURE GAUGE】Equipped with pressure gauge and adjustable flow meter which helps you control the smoke effect easily. When the pressure gauge runs to the maximum, the flow meter drops to 0, indicating that your pipeline is not leaking. On the contrary, it means there is smoke leakage.
【Air Mode & Smoke Mode】The V3 smoke leak tester adopts an independent switch control design, the air mode independently controls the built-in air pump, the smoke mode independently controls the smoke generator. With intelligent protection, if the working limit is exceeded, the power will be automatically turned off to ensure the safety of the operator and equipment.
【WIDELY COMPATIBILITY】Our package includes all accessories (Oil not included), it supports detect the leaks of multi pipe systems on cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, off-road vehicles, ATVs, light trucks and speedboats boats. The fuel pipeline leak diagnostic machine is suitable for all brands and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 Automotive Smoke Machine is a universal and professional auto pipe leak detect tool, it will help us position cars motorcycles leakage on the pipe systems quickly and exactly.

VXSCAN V3 TESTER SUPPORTS:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

V3 evap smoke machine can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

2 MODE CONTROL:

  • Smoke Control: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal.
  • Air Control: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE.

Read more

What’s In the Box

  • 1pcs * Car Smoke Leak Detector
  • 1pcs * Hook (with hand-tighten nuts)
  • 1pcs * Universal Intake Bladder
  • 1pcs * Intake Bladder Replacement Rubber
  • 1pcs * Smoke Hose
  • 1pcs * Power Cord
  • 1pcs * Funnel & Oil Bottle (No oil includ)
  • 1pcs * User Manual

Notice before Leak Test

  • Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle
  • Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.
  • Only support a 12V battery with a current range of 8-10A. (Ordinary car batteries are eligible)
Specification

  • Output Pressure: 7-12 PSI
  • Output Flow: <6 L/Min
  • Power Supply: 12V automobile Battery 6Amp
  • Air Pressure Output: Built-in air pump
  • Test Oil Capacity: 10-20ml
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

Read more

How to

  • Fill 10-20ml baby oil to the evap smoke machine for the first time (Do not inject too much at once).
  • Open the engine cover, and hang the detector in the cover.

Use

  • Disconnect the pipes that need to be connected with the smoke leak detector.
  • Insert universal Adapter Cone or other accessories and test pipe.

Leak

  • Connect your car leak test machine power cord to the 12V vehicle battery (red clip to battery positive, black clip to ground, then the power LED will light up, otherwise you need to check the power)
  • Inset the Smoke delivery hose to ddapter cone.

Tester

  • Press Air Control Switch, wait for seconds until the system is pressurized, check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status. Turn on the smoke generator, adjust the smoke amount to suitable amount so you can locate the leak position quickly.
  • The leak can be judged according to where the smoke appears.

Read more

Pressure Gauge

Displays the output pressure of the machine or show the real time pressure of the system been testing.

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Air Flow Meter

Provide a quick visual indication of the amount of air/smoke passing through the system being tested.

Check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status, V3 evap smoke machine can help you find and fix leak problems quickly!

Overload Protection

VXSCAN V3 automotive smoke machine leak detector has built in self-protective system: Overheat and Anti-frost Protection. When the temperature of the device exceeds 120℃, power protection will be intelligently activated to turn it off. The device can also work normally at -20℃. You don’t have to worry about switching on and off the machine constantly during diagnosis. The system takes care of the load for you.

Read more

4.5
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Car Battery Charger 12V/10A 24V/5A

30% FASTER QUICK CHARGER

12V 10-Amp and 24V 5-Amp 7-stage quick battery charger, charging speed is much faster than 8-Amp or 5-Amp automatic chargers.

HIGH-EFFICIENCY PULSE REPAIR

Automatically detects battery sulfation and acid stratification, take newest pulse repair function to restore lost battery performance for stronger engine starts and extended battery life.

8 CHARGING PROTECTION

Smart control, temp compensation in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates, reverse protection, cooling system, overcurrent, fireproof material, overvoltage, short circuit.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS Input voltage：AC:110-220V (50-60HZ) Output voltage: 12V-15.5V/24V-31V Output current: DC = 12V10A/24V5A(Max) Dimensions: 158*95*62mm Net weight: 560g

Great cooling system

There is a cooling fan design at the bottom of the battery charger, which has powerful heat dissipation function, which can operate the battery charger for a long time and keep it in a low temperature state without damaging the battery charger.

Safer alligator clip and Pure copper wire

Rugged and durable, alligator clip wrapped in insulating material.The use of international standard pure copper wire can output current stably, even if the charging wire is used for a long time, it will not generate heat and is not dangerous.

Flame retardant shell material solid

The use of ABS Flame-retardant shell has features of fireproof, anti-electric shock, anti-corrosion, strong.

Charging Current
5 Amp 8 Amp 10 Amp

Output Current
5A 12V/8A & 24V/4A 10A 12V & 5A 24V

12V Repair Mode

✓

✓

✓

Multi-Safety Protections

✓

✓

✓

Input Voltage
100-240VAC 50/60Hz 100-240V 50-60Hz 100-240V 50-60HZ

All in One – Battery Charger automotive 10-Amp 12V and 24V Fully-Automatic Smart, It’s smaller but delivers more power. It’s the all-in-one solution battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, plus battery desulfator. Charge or repair all 12V and 24V lead-acid automotive, marine, and deep-cycle batteries, including AGM, GEL, SLA, and Flooded in cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, lawnmowers, boats, marine, etc. LITHIUM BATTERIES ARE NOT ALLOWED
Restore your Battery – Built-in advanced battery REPAIR mode to help to recover old/idle batteries and extend battery life. If the car battery charger cannot charge the battery, please use repair mode. The high-frequency and low-frequency pulse technology has good repair and activation effects. Note: It can not activate a dead battery or repair a damaged battery.
Enjoy Precision Charging – Using a backlit LCD, the battery charger automotive clearly and visibly shows an LCD screen displaying the charging status and battery status; An integrated thermal sensor detects the ambient temperature and alters the charge to eliminate over-charging in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates.
8 Charging Protection – The charging cable contains heat-resistant and oxidation-resistant copper wire, which is not easy to break. It has protection circuits such as overcharge/overvoltage/overcurrent/short course, with functions such as overcurrent protection, short circuit protection, reverse connection protection, overheat protection, overvoltage protection, and Undervoltage protection.
Intelligent Memory – The Car Battery Charger mode has a memory function. After charging, it defaults to the state mode used before the last power failure. Bright memory is convenient to use. (Repair mode without memory function) Note: It can’t jump start the car, only the battery charging function. Requires power connection

Enjoy Happy Driving

Provide a variety of accessories required for the car

Can it be set to automatically come on when you enter the car？

  • Yes if you leave it plugged in with the power button on, it will power on and off with your car’s ignition and it will keep the color you set last time.

How to connect the Smart APP?

  1. Scan the QR code on the box to download the smart APP
  2. Open your phone Bluetooth to search for led lights devices, device name format: KSxx-xxxxxx
  3. Forbid to click the led lights device name directly, they will be connected automatically when you enter the APP.
  4. Enter the smart APP, click car light to start your technology journey.

They’re broken,can I get replacements?

  • Yes,Don’t worry, Don’t be shy, please tell us that if there is any quality problem with the product, We will help you until you are satisfied.

User Guide:

  • Use “cloth” or “paper towel” to clean the surface of the object where the car led lights will be installed.
  • Separate the tape from the backing layer.Paste the led strip lights on the surface of the object and press hard to make it fit more evenly and tightly.
  • The adhesive strength of the glue is related to time, the adhesive strength after the first paste is 40% of its maximum adhesion, and it takes 72 hours to reach the maximum adhesive strength.
  • If you have any question about our product, please go to your Amazon product page “Sold” – “Question”.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Price: $64.95 - $34.96
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:44:58 UTC – Details)


Meet the GENIUS2, one of our most powerful, highest-performing, energy-efficient, and compact portable universal battery chargers yet. The GENIUS2 is a 2-amp (30-watt) – 100-240VAC 50-60Hz – 6-volt and 12-volt heavy-duty battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, float charger, and battery desulfator for up to 40 amp-hours. It’s designed to charge and maintain all types of sealed lead-acid and lithium-ion (lifepo4) batteries, including flooded, gel, maintenance-free, AGM, SLA, VRLA, as well as automotive, marine, RV, powersports, and deep-cycle batteries. Its advanced battery repair regenerator mode uses slow pulse reconditioner technology to automatically detect battery sulfation and acid stratification, restoring lost battery performance for extended battery life. It can be used and stored almost anywhere – home, garage, mobile, bench, or in car – to charge and maintain any battery – even plug in through your vehicle’s 12V auxiliary cigarette lighter port. Its next-generation charging regime utilizes fast charging microprocessor technology to rapidly recharge batteries without any manual intervention. It’s a completely automatic, worry-free, professional, and commercial-grade intelligent battery charger with zero overcharge. Designed to be dual purpose – both indoors and outdoors – providing weatherproof and waterproof protection from the outside elements during any time of the year, including winter. Its X-Connect battery connectors – better than SAE – allow for quick-connect permanent connection or connecting directly to the battery terminals. A digital display provides the charging status and tests diagnostics for multiple conditions such as a dead battery, bad battery, reverse polarity, and more. And it’s compatible with all types of gas and diesel vehicles, including cars, automobiles, motorcycles, dirt bikes, scooters, mopeds, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, lawn tractors, trailers, trucks, SUVs, boats, campers, RVs, jet skis, PWCs, wave runners, snowmobiles, 4-wheelers, generators, golf carts, classic cars, including BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Bentley, Maserati, Lexus, VW, Audi, Ford, Chevrolet, Corvette, Cadillac, Jeep, Prius, Toyota, Subaru, Nissan, Honda, Harley-Davidson, Suzuki, Yamaha, Kawasaki, Ducati, KTM, Indian, Husqvarna, Vespa, Polaris, Seadoo, John Deere and more.
Meet the GENIUS2 – Similar to our G1100, just better. It’s 30% smaller and delivers over 140% more power. It’s the all-in-one universal charging solution – battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, float charger, plus battery desulfator.
Do more with Genius – Designed for 6-volt and 12-volt sealed lead-acid automotive, marine, RV, powersport, and deep-cycle batteries, including flooded, gel, AGM, SLA, VRLA and maintenance-free, plus lithium-ion batteries (lifepo4).
Enjoy precision charging – An integrated digital thermal sensor detects the ambient temperature and alters the charge to eliminate over-charging in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates.
Charge dead batteries – Charges batteries as low as 1-volt. Or use the all-new force mode that allows you to take control and manually begin charging dead batteries down to zero volts.
Restore your battery – An advanced battery repair mode uses slow pulse reconditioner technology to detect battery sulfation and acid stratification to restore lost battery performance for stronger engine starts and extended battery life.
Beyond maintenance – It’s not just a battery trickle charger, it’s an advanced battery charger maintainer. A fully-automatic, worry-free smart battery charger for everyday use – 24/7 – with zero overcharge.
Compatible with all types of gas and diesel vehicles – Charge and maintain cars, automobiles, motorcycles, dirt bikes, scooters, mopeds, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, tractors, trucks, SUVs, RVs, campers, trailers, boats, PWCs, jet skis, snowmobiles, golf carts, classic cars, and more.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $124.95 - $74.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:43:52 UTC – Details)


Meet the GENIUS10, one of our most powerful, highest-performing, energy-efficient, and compact portable universal battery chargers yet. The GENIUS10 is a 10-amp (150-watt) – 100-240VAC 50-60Hz – 6-volt and 12-volt heavy-duty battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, float charger, and battery desulfator for up to 230 amp-hours. It’s designed to charge and maintain all types of sealed lead-acid and lithium-ion (lifepo4) batteries, including flooded, gel, maintenance-free, AGM, SLA, VRLA, as well as automotive, marine, RV, powersports, and deep-cycle batteries. Its advanced battery repair regenerator mode uses slow pulse reconditioner technology to automatically detect battery sulfation and acid stratification, restoring lost battery performance for extended battery life. It can be used and stored almost anywhere – home, garage, mobile, bench, or in car – to charge and maintain any battery – even plug in through your vehicle’s 12V auxiliary cigarette lighter port. Its next-generation charging regime utilizes fast charging microprocessor technology to rapidly recharge batteries without any manual intervention. It’s a completely automatic, worry-free, professional, and commercial-grade intelligent battery charger with zero overcharge. Designed to be dual purpose – both indoors and outdoors – providing weatherproof and waterproof protection from the outside elements during any time of the year, including winter. Its X-Connect battery connectors – better than SAE – allow for quick-connect permanent connection or connecting directly to the battery terminals. A digital display provides the charging status and tests diagnostics for multiple conditions such as a dead battery, bad battery, reverse polarity, and more. And it’s compatible with all types of gas and diesel vehicles, including cars, automobiles, motorcycles, dirt bikes, scooters, mopeds, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, lawn tractors, trailers, trucks, SUVs, boats, campers, RVs, jet skis, PWCs, wave runners, snowmobiles, 4-wheelers, generators, golf carts, classic cars, including BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Bentley, Maserati, Lexus, VW, Audi, Ford, Chevrolet, Corvette, Cadillac, Jeep, Prius, Toyota, Subaru, Nissan, Honda, Harley-Davidson, Suzuki, Yamaha, Kawasaki, Ducati, KTM, Indian, Husqvarna, Vespa, Polaris, Seadoo, John Deere and more.
Meet the GENIUS10 – Similar to our G7200, just better. It’s 17% smaller and delivers over 115% more power. It’s the all-in-one universal charging solution – battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, float charger, plus battery desulfator.
Do more with Genius – Designed for 6-volt and 12-volt sealed lead-acid automotive, marine, RV, powersport, and deep-cycle batteries, including flooded, gel, AGM, SLA, VRLA and maintenance-free, plus lithium-ion batteries (lifepo4).
Enjoy precision charging – An integrated digital thermal sensor detects the ambient temperature and alters the charge to eliminate over-charging in hot climates and under-charging in cold climates.
Charge dead batteries – Charges batteries as low as 1-volt. Or use the all-new force mode that allows you to take control and manually begin charging dead batteries down to zero volts.
Restore your battery – An advanced battery repair mode uses slow pulse reconditioner technology to detect battery sulfation and acid stratification to restore lost battery performance for stronger engine starts and extended battery life.
Beyond maintenance – It’s not just a battery trickle charger, it’s an advanced battery charger maintainer. A fully-automatic, worry-free smart battery charger for everyday use – 24/7 – with zero overcharge.
Compatible with all types of gas and diesel vehicles – Charge and maintain cars, automobiles, motorcycles, dirt bikes, scooters, mopeds, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, tractors, trucks, SUVs, RVs, campers, trailers, boats, PWCs, jet skis, snowmobiles, golf carts, classic cars, and more.
